1.text: Pick up the first chopstick and place it between where your index finger and thumb connect.

2.text: Grip the second chopstick with your index finger and thumb.

3.text: Practice opening and closing the chopsticks.

5.text: Know the rules when sharing food.

6.text: Know what to do with them when not eating.

7.text: When eating rice, be willing to dig in.
